DOC.brief_summary: Post-market registry aim evaluate safety performance ACURATE neo™ Aortic Bioprosthesis ACURATE TF™ Transfemoral Delivery System patient severe aortic stenosis treat commercialized device
DOC.brief_title: Symetis ACURATE Neo™ Valve Implantation SAVI TF Registry
DOC.detailed_description: The SAVI TF single arm , multicenter , non-randomized open registry . The purpose registry collect monitor ongoing safety performance data commercial use ACURATE neo™ Aortic Bioprosthesis ACURATE TF™ Transfemoral Delivery System . The ACURATE neo™ Transfemoral Delivery System intend use minimally invasive , transcatheter aortic valve replacement ( TAVR ) use transfemoral access patient present severe aortic valve stenosis . The primary objective evaluate safety performance ACURATE neo™ Aortic Bioprosthesis ACURATE TF™ Transfemoral Delivery System first 1000 consecutive patient severe aortic stenosis treat newly market device . The secondary objective evaluate adverse event device performance newly market device .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient include registry eligible transcatheter treatment severe aortic stenosis ACURATE neo™ Aortic Bioprosthesis ACURATE TF™ Transfemoral Delivery System per Instructions Use 2 . Patient willing participate study , provide sign Informed Consent/Data Authorization Form authorize share data registry 3 . The subject treating physician agree subject return require postprocedure followup visit 1 . Patients exclude registry eligible transcatheter treatment severe aortic stenosis ACURATE neo™ Aortic Bioprosthesis ACURATE TF™ Transfemoral Delivery System per Instructions For Use .
